name: R-S-C
description:
This game has been made as University project for a optional extra that I have taken on top of my actual 120 credits required to progress into Honors. I really enjoyed making this game as I feel have improved my coding abilities and skills greatly.

I have also received help from another colleague for level design. Will - TwistedRabbit.

Controls WASD for camera controlls, with Q,E rotating .

Mouse left button to control units and tell them where to go by selecting the grid.

Enjoy my first ever turn base strategy game.
